Reading through these comments, I see a remarkable socio-cultural clash theme emerging between the US and... the Dutch! The US expresses a sense of mystery, suspicion and seclusion towards local community for anonymity and random yet moral action. Yet the Dutch are deeply immersed in localized friendships and travel paths that one must be related to be included.

That's weird because I have relatives living in the US yet barely in Holland. Another weird
